Title: White Light
Plot: Tom is furious upon finding out that Lyttel took his son Kyle into custody. Diana offers him help in getting Kyle back. Meanwhile, Richard suspects that Collier is trying to take control of Lily's life, and as soon as Collier reveals his intentions, Richard and Lily leave Arcadia Estates. Elsewhere, Danny snaps at Shawn when he finds out that he and Nikki have slept together. Tom and Diana finally find out what really happened to the 4400, which leaves a disturbing question: is this the end - or
GuestStars: Gillian Barber,  Mark Valley,  Jonathan Holmes,  Louis Chirillo,  Jason Low,  Shawn Reis,  Leanne Adachi,  Dawn Mander
